Job Title: Video Editor

Location: Scottsdale, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Production, Public Relations

Description:
POSITION SUMMARYAs a Video Editor, you will serve as the official editor for all things Cardone Ventures, editing mission-based objectives and supporting content creation for digital. To ensure success, you should have expert knowledge of modern video editing techniques, be able to visualize directorial concepts and work according to a strict time schedule. Ultimately, a top-notch Video Editor can perfectly translate an idea into a beautifully crafted film or video piece, worthy of digital.
ABOUT CARDONE VENTURESOur mission is to help business owners achieve their personal, professional, and goals through the growth of their businesses. We work in dozens of verticals and provide strategic business guidance through courses, live events, partnerships, and investments. Our core values are the backbone of our business and guide our hiring process: we are inspirational, accountable, transparent, disciplined, aligned, and results oriented. This company operates nationally and is growing by the day.
OBJECTIVESWork with the Marketing team to determine production visionInsert intentional dialog, sound effects, music, graphics, and special effects to enhance the storyCreate high quality podcasts for social platformsLeverage AI technologies to enhance workflowAssist in using a studio space for live calls and other video contentCreate content that is optimized for social media platforms aligned with company wide campaigns and social media trendsCreate quick, same day turn around content for event promotional use and recapsDevelop promotional content for digital platforms that are conversion driven (paid traffic)Cohesively tell a story through NLE (non-linear editing) using video, graphics, music, and sound design.Operate computer editing systems and equipment used for video content creation (Premiere Pro)Improve video and sound quality using various video softwareEdit video to include preselected music, interviews, sound clips and other important aspects of the projectArchive footage in a highly organized manner
COMPETENCIESExperience producing and editing video content for a variety of digital platformsAbility to innovate with outside the box techniques through experimenting with trending/modern techniques – we need highly creative editing wizardsFull understanding of of Adobe Creative Suite - including Premiere Pro, Encover, After Effects (additional programs are a plus)Demonstrate the ability to craft story lines to “tell the story” in a captivating formAbility to create visually amazing (export liquid gold) content including cutting promos, podcasts, event recaps and live showsAdvanced knowledge of professional production procedures, practices, project tracking/management, techniques and terminologyCan keep on top of current video trends, innovations in camera and lighting technology, and effective practices to stay on top of creating effective video that will best connect with our audience
EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCEAt least 3 years’ experience in an Editor position
PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTSProlonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computer
COMMITMENT TO DIVERSITYAs an equal opportunity employer committed to meeting the needs of a multigenerational and multicultural workforce Cardone Ventures recognizes that a diverse staff, reflective of our community, is an integral and welcome part of a successful and ethical business. We hire local talent at all levels regardless of race, color, religion, age, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation or disability, and actively foster inclusion in all forms both within our company and across interactions with clients, candidates and partners.
If this position caught your eye, send us your resume! For best consideration, include the job title and source where you found this position in the subject line of your email to careers @cardoneventures.com. Already a Cardone Ventures candidate? Please connect directly with your recruiter to discuss this opportunity.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
